paragraph.en: On November 6th 2021 (AEST), there will be a fiafia night for you, our dear brothers and sisters! A night of entertainment and encouragement, provided by our spiritual family from around the world. If you would like to contribute a performance item to this wonderful evening, please explore this site for ideas. üòä
paragraph.sm: I le aso Novema 6 2021 (AEST), o le a faia ai se fiafia mo outou uso ma tuafafine peleina! O le a faatumulia i ni faafiafiaga ma ni faalaeiauga mai o tatou aiga faaleagaga mai vaipanoa eseese o le lalolagi. A fia fai sou sao i lenei faatasiga fiafia, faamolemole taga‚Äôi atili i lenei itulau. O le a iai nisi faamatalaga faaopoopo. üòä

paragraph.en: Hello! We are your fellow brothers and sisters bringing to you this evening of entertainment. If you would like to contact us or have any questions not answered on this website, please send an email to thenightbeforeproductions@gmail.com.
